Getting support¶

If you experience problems using NIX feel free to join our IRC channel #gnode at FreeNode or write an email to dev@g-node.org. If you find a bug or have a feature request please report it using the project issue tracker.

Contact¶

The project is maintained by the German Neuroinformatics Node, G-Node. G-Node at GitHub, email.
